bibl.title: A Clarification of φοῖνιξ μονόξυλος and φοῖνιξ καθαρός / ῥυπαρός.
bibl.note: Φοῖνιξ μονόξυλος (date clusters) and φοῖνιξ ῥυπαρός (dates on their strands) / καθαρός (dates "cleaned off" the strands) reflect the perspectives of the grower and the purveyor / purchaser, respectively.
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, A Clarification of φοῖνιξ μονόξυλος and φοῖνιξ καθαρός / ῥυπαρός.

Φοῖνιξ μονόξυλος (date clusters) and φοῖνιξ ῥυπαρός (dates on their strands) / καθαρός (dates "cleaned off" the strands) reflect the perspectives of the grower and the purveyor / purchaser, respectively.
